oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Letter and envelope to Mrs. H. H. Ring
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: A three page letter written on Knights of Columbus stationary dated Jan. 13th, 1919 from 1st Lt Harold P. Caldwell to Mrs. Ring regarding the circumstances of her son's wounding and subsequent death. Frank M. Ring served in Co. A, 114th MG BN, 117th Inf. Regt., 30th Div. He was killed in action in October 1918. His two older brothers also served in the Army and survived. The Ring family was from Franklin, Williamson County, Tennessee.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
